contractObjectiveList.title: Take Dr. Farah Murad to the comm control station
Hold out while Dr. Murad uploads the Locura to the Iberia

dialogueContent.words: Sorry about the rough landing. Farah, you okay in there?
Yeahâ€¦ I'm all right. This rumble seat is even less comfortable than it looks, though.
Tell me about it. Did you find the care package I left in there for you?
The explosives? Yes. I'll set them to bring down the control tower after I've uploaded the Locura to the Iberia.
There goes the towerâ€¦ and the Directorateâ€™s communications network along with it. Nowâ€¦ who wants to take bets on whether or not the plan worked?
We won't have to wait long to find out. The transmission went throughâ€”the Iberia's computer should be processing the Locura's code right now. I imagine thatâ€”
Hang on a second, Docâ€”we've got an incoming transmission. Putting it on screen.
Let's get moving, Commanderâ€¦ Lady Arano is counting on us.
APC down, Commander.
That's both APCs down! There go our chances of hacking into those turretsâ€¦
Powering down enemy turrets, Commander. Give us a moment, and we'll modify their targeting protocols.
Alpha turrets are ours, Commander!
Bravo turrets belong to us!
All right, I'm inside. Should take me a few minutes to find the array's control center, hook up the drive, and prep the system to transmit the Locura to the Iberia.
And on that note, I'm going radio silent for a bitâ€”I need to concentrate while I work on this. I'll be in touch soon.
Commander, be advised that I'm seeing heavy activity on all Directorate comm channels. You're about to have company.
Okay, it's officialâ€”rumble seats are a bad idea, and I don't like getting shot at. I really, really don't.
Heads up, Commanderâ€”we've got a Directorate lance touching down!
We've lost a turret!
Stay frosty! Assault 'Mechs inbound!
Commander, Farah? I've just touched down, but we've got a problem. I have a squadron of Directorate aerospace fighters on radar, and they're headed our way.
Damn it. We need to clear out of here before they arrive. How much time have we got?
Not muchâ€¦ and they're carrying enough hardware to blow our Leopard to hell and back again.
I can do this. Just keep the Directorate off me, Commanderâ€”I need only a few more minutes.
Farah, we are OUT OF TIME. Those fighters are almost within weapons range, I need to come get you NOW.
Remote trigger armed, explosives primedâ€¦ I'm ready! Meet me at the evac point and we'll get the hell out of here!

Attention, forces of the Arano Restoration! This is Commodore Samuel Ostergaard, formerly of the Concord Navy. As of today, I no longer serve my country; I come to you as a grieving father, not a Taurian sailor. My actions are my own.

In three minutes' time, my ship will enter weapons range of your position. At that time, your lives will come to an abrupt end. I suggest that you pray to whatever godsâ€” [sound of alarm klaxons] [confused shouting] [static]

longDescription: Virulent AIs, Zombies, Cat girls. I think we have seen it all Commander

objectiveList.title: Get Farah to the Comm Control Station

objectiveList.description: We're over here, and we really need to be over there.
objectiveList.title: Escort the APC to Turret Control Alpha

objectiveList.description: We're over here, and we really need to be over there.
objectiveList.title: Escort the APC to Turret Control Bravo
Hold the base while Farah rigs the comm array

shortDescription: Well since we made it this far and I have definitely eaten more than I should have. Why don't I regale to you the dangerous gambit the Commander made in a all or nothing ploy to get her homeworld back. It was written like a pre warp science fiction flick, but who am I to judge. Oh right I am Duncan Fisher..
